Field.Name: RVERSED_DATA_FOR_CRC
Field.Description: During CRC calculation the packet data bits are reversed

Field.Name: INVERT_REVERSED_CRC
Field.Description: During CRC calculation the result is inverted and reversed before stamping

Field.Name: RST_CRC_TO_HIGH
Field.Description: During CRC calculations, reset CRC value is taken to be 32'hffffffff

Field.Name: USE_NXOR_FOR_PRBS
Field.Description: During PRBS calculations the next bit is created using NXOR (and not XOR)

Field.Name: USE_NTP_TOD
Field.Description: If set, SAT statistics is uses NTP time of day format, otherwise 1588 is used

Field.Name: NUM_CLKS_IN_CYCLE
Field.Description: Number of clocks between pulses for leaky backets

Field.Name: NUM_CLOCKS_SEC
Field.Description: Number of system clock cycles in one second; default value reflects 720MHz clock

Field.Name: EVC_PAIR_SET
Field.Description: If set, two flow will be paring

Field.Name: PKT_GEN_ENABLE
Field.Description: If set, GTF start to send packet

Field.Name: BYTES_PER_CYCLE_MANTISSA
Field.Description: number of byest to add to credidts every cycle - mantissa

Field.Name: BYTES_PER_CYCLE_EXPONENT
Field.Description: number of byest to add to credidts every cycle - exponent

Field.Name: MAX_CREDITS_MANTISSA
Field.Description: upper limit on number of accumulated credits - mantissa

Field.Name: MAX_CREDITS_EXPONENT
Field.Description: upper limit on number of accumulated credits - exponent

Field.Name: CREDITS_PER_PACKET_EN
Field.Description: If set, rate is counted in packets rather than bytes

Field.Name: STOP_BURST_CNT
Field.Description: leave BURST state when this limit is reached

Field.Name: STOP_INTERVAL_CNT
Field.Description: leave INTERVAL state when this limit is reached

Field.Name: BURST_PKT_WEIGHT
Field.Description: Every packet in BURST state increases the counter by this value

Field.Name: INTERVAL_PKT_WEIGHT
Field.Description: Every packet in INTERVAL state increases the counter by this value

Field.Name: SET_INTRVAL_CNT_TO_CFG
Field.Description: If set, INTERVAL state limit is set to the configuration, otherwise to the number of packets sent in BURST state

Field.Name: BURST_MODE
Field.Description: If set, INTERVAL state limit is set to the configuration, otherwise to the number of packets sent in BURST state

Field.Name: STOP_ITER_CNT
Field.Description: Stop after this number of iterations

Field.Name: CNTR_8_BIT_ENABLE
Field.Description: If set, enable 8 bit counter stamp

Field.Name: CNTR_8_BIT_OFFSET
Field.Description: Stamp offset in bits - where to stamp the counter, beginning from start of packet

Field.Name: CNTR_8_BIT_INC_STEP
Field.Description: Increment step - by 8 the counter should be incremented

Field.Name: CNTR_8_BIT_PERIOD
Field.Description: Increment period - counter may be incremented every 1/2/4/8 packets

Field.Name: CNTR_16_BIT_ENABLE
Field.Description: If set, enable 16 bit counter stamp

Field.Name: CNTR_16_BIT_OFFSET
Field.Description: Stamp offset in bits - where to stamp the counter, beginning from start of packet

Field.Name: CNTR_16_BIT_INC_STEP
Field.Description: Increment step - by 16 the counter should be incremented

Field.Name: CNTR_16_BIT_PERIOD
Field.Description: Increment period - counter may be incremented every 1/2/4/8 packets

Field.Name: STMP_16_BIT_ENABLE
Field.Description: If set, 16 bit stamp - constant value to stamp into the packet

Field.Name: RPT_PATTERN
Field.Description: Repeatable pattern to be used as paylaod

Field.Name: FLOW_CORE_ID
Field.Description: Per flow core ID (0 or 1) for SAT to transmit packets.

Field.Name: PKT_HEADER_POINT
Field.Description: Points to start of flow's packet header in PktHeader memory, 4B aligned.

Field.Name: CRC_OFFSET
Field.Description: First CRC coverred byte - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: SEQ_NUM_OFFSET
Field.Description: Sequence number offset - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: USE_4_BYTE_PATTERN
Field.Description: Use 4 byte repeatable pattern in the payload

Field.Name: CRC_OFFSET
Field.Description: First CRC coverred byte - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: SEQ_NUM_OFFSET
Field.Description: Sequence number offset - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: USE_4_BYTE_PATTERN
Field.Description: Use 4 byte repeatable pattern in the payload

Field.Name: CRC_OFFSET
Field.Description: First CRC coverred byte - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: SEQ_NUM_OFFSET
Field.Description: Sequence number offset - from the OAM PDU start

Field.Name: USE_4_BYTE_PATTERN
Field.Description: Use 4 byte repeatable pattern in the payload

Field.Name: RX_TRAP_CODE_0
Field.Description: Trap code to compare against the trap code of the received packet

Field.Name: RX_TRAP_CODE_1
Field.Description: Trap code to compare against the trap code of the received packet

Field.Name: RX_TRAP_CODE_2
Field.Description: Trap code to compare against the trap code of the received packet

AppDB.Name: SAT_RX_BIN_LIMIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: SAT Flv Bin delay limitation configuration

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_0
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_1
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_2
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_3
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_4
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_5
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_6
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_7
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: LIMIT_FLV_BIN_DELAY_COUNTERS_8
Field.Description: Limit for Flv Bin delay counters

Field.Name: NUM_SLTS_FOR_STATS_TO_SWTICH
Field.Description: number of slots for statistics state machine to switch state

Field.Name: THRSH_IN_SLOT_TO_CHANGE_GOOD_BAD
Field.Description: Threshold on number of lost in slot to decide on good/bad slot

Field.Name: UPDATE_CNTR_ALWS
Field.Description: Statistics counters are updated both in Available and Non-Available states

Field.Name: CLEAR_ON_READ
Field.Description: If set, al the statistics for the accessed flow ID are cleared

Field.Name: CALC_EQUAL_FDV_BINS
Field.Description: If set, FDV bins are calculated per flow, otherwise use global configuration

Field.Name: FDV_BIN_MIN_DELAY
Field.Description: Minimum expected delay, for FDV bin claculation

Field.Name: CALC_EQUAL_FDV_BINS
Field.Description: If set, FDV bins are calculated per flow, otherwise use global configuration

Field.Name: FDV_BIN_MIN_DELAY
Field.Description: Minimum expected delay, for FDV bin claculation

Field.Name: CALC_EQUAL_FDV_BINS
Field.Description: If set, FDV bins are calculated per flow, otherwise use global configuration

Field.Name: FDV_BIN_MIN_DELAY
Field.Description: Minimum expected delay, for FDV bin claculation

Field.Name: OOO_PKT_CNTR_ACCUM
Field.Description: accumulated Counter for out of order packet

Field.Name: OOO_OCTET_CNTR_ACCUM
Field.Description: accumulated Counter for out of order octet

Field.Name: LAST_PKT_DELAY_ACCUM
Field.Description: accumulated counter for last packet delay

Field.Name: SEC_IN_AVAIL_STATE_CNTR
Field.Description: Counter for sec in avail state

Field.Name: EXP_SEQ_NUMBER
Field.Description: Expected sequence number always increase 1 based on received packet.

Field.Name: EXP_SEQ_NUMBER
Field.Description: Expected sequence number always increase 1 based on received packet.

Field.Name: EXP_SEQ_NUMBER
Field.Description: Expected sequence number always increase 1 based on received packet.

Field.Name: DYNAMIC_MEMORY_ACCESS_ENABLE
Field.Description: If set it enables writing to Dynamic memories.

Field.Name: REPORT_THREHOLD
Field.Description: For which random value of 8-bit counter a report should be issued.

Field.Name: REPORT_THREHOLD
Field.Description: For which random value of 8-bit counter a report should be issued.

Field.Name: REPORT_THREHOLD
Field.Description: For which random value of 8-bit counter a report should be issued.
